amendment.description: To provide for mental health counselors under TRICARE.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2456 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2456 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Dole. (consideration: CR S12497-12513; text: CR S12507) To provide for mental health counselors under TRICARE.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2456 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
